problems.title: Prove Gauss’s law for the electric field in vacuum
problems.description: Prove Gauss’s law for the electric field in a vacuum using Maxwell’s equations.
hints: Start from Maxwell's equations in differential form; use ∇·E = ρ/ε₀ and ρ = 0 in vacuum.
Apply the divergence theorem to connect integral and differential forms.
